feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -28.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 42 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
